questions.subject: MATHEMATICS
questions.questionText: For the system of linear equations: 2x - y + 3z = 5, 3x + 2y - z = 7, 4x + 5y + λz = μ, which of the following is NOT correct?

options.text: The system has infinitely many solutions for λ = -6 and μ = 9
The system is inconsistent for λ = -5 and μ = 8
The system has infinitely many solutions for λ = -5 and μ = 9
The system has a unique solution for λ ≠ -5 and μ = 8

questions.concept: Consistency and solutions of linear systems
